name: Mashell Terry
text: Dawn and her team are amazing! I can't imagine what i would've done without their help saving priceless photos and mementos from my children and my deceased father. My computer crashed and they recovered most of my photos and taught me how to back them up. Affordable and fast service. I wouldn't use anyone else

resp.text: Thank you for the nice review! Glad we were able to recover most of your pictures!

name: Jenny
text: Best staff! Dawn, Steve, and Steven are a great group! Super helpful, extremely educated. Been there twice so far and they've been able to fix my problem both times. Give them a try!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Jenny!

name: Allen Womack
text: Major upgrade slowed down my  computer, tech team had me up and running again in 48hrs.  Super friendly, very knowledgeable, and always professional.  Great team awesome support

resp.text: Thanks Allen, glad the memory made a big difference right now without having to look into a video card conversion!

name: Troy Corbin
text: Avanti Computers offers honest, dependable computer and networking solutions for all kinds of small business. Whenever I have an issue or question Dawn is always fast and accurate. I can't say enough good stuff about them.

name: Landis Griffin
text: The staff at Avanti has saved my computer once again! Quick service, great advice.  Thank you so much.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Landis!

name: Bob Schlink
text: I have always gotten excellent advise and service from Dawn and her staff. Would definitely refer them to anyone.

name: Jen Arndt
text: Super fast transaction with my livescan. The lady who assist me she was very friendly and smiling.

resp.text: Thank you and glad to be of assistance!

name: R.L. Hawkersmith
text: I give them 3- F's / Friendly / Fast / "Forable"

resp.text: :)   thanks for the review!  Not to downgrade any other review, but love this review!

name: Mark Johnson
text: Definitely a great place to go to. Highly recommended

name: Larry Griffin
text: These folks seem to know what they are doing.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!  We work hard to take care of our customers.

name: Kevin
text: Super knowledgeable and friendly!

name: Nicole L
text: Just had a great experience - The other cellphone shop was going to charge me $30 just to diagnosis my phone so I went in with my phone to here instead. My phone was completely unusable but wanted to see if fixing the screen would help me be able to unlock it because my phone wasnt backed up- The owner fixed my screen but saw that my phone was wiped so there was no point in me trying to fix it since I just wanted the data. He charged me nothing even though he did a ton of work just to help me diagnosis it. Really fast and helpful service 100% recommend this place

name: Mike
text: My iPhone SE lost it's ability to charge with an apple lightning cable. I dropped off the phone and two hours later, the technician diagnosed the issue as a bad lightning port and ordered a new one. I returned the next day to learn a bad logic board was instead at fault. I decided not to fix it since the phone could still charge with an aftermarket cable.  After this process, he billed only for the aftermarket cable.

name: Jacob Brown
text: Amazing, fixed my phone in a couple hours. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Amber English
text: I took in my iPhone 11 that I was sure was beyond repair, and I walked out less than 30 minutes later with a display that’s clearer than ever. Friendly customer service and better than expected pricing.

name: unsolicited confidence
text: My experience was great! My dell inspiron computer was not turning on, so i tried to fix it with the help of the dell help forum. The instructions didn’t help me much so i went to the phone clinic. He fixed my computer in like 5 minutes and didn’t charge for it since it was such a small repair. Very fast very effective

name: Kassiday J
text: I Spent over $130+ getting my screen fixed and purchased an otter box. After one drop my screen is shattered flashing different colors, pretty much ruined. I called to be informed there’s no warranty and it’s nothing he can do regards to the otter box not working. So please keep in mind before going here that you’re paying a lot of money for no warranty. I had to go elsewhere and pay more and was informed the screen I got originally from this place was poor quality.

resp.text:
Hey Kassiday.

I am the manager, and i told to our technician.

He will fix it for $49, which does not even cover part price.

Physical damage is very hard to control. We see customers drop and break their 5 times a month.

We also have many customers  visit us after 2 years to repair another device.

We understand your frustration but just wanted to remind that even Apple does not cover pysical damages.

name: Haley Bobbitt
text: This place is awesome! They had my phone fixed super fast after I had taken my phone to get fixed at Best Buy they told me I needed a new phone and didn’t even open it to look at it! They fixed my phone very cheaply and were very nice!

name: Vega Foster
text:
The Phone Clinic should be your #1 stop if you've damaged your phone from a drop. After a drop that ruined my iPhone X's screen, he was able to replace the screen for far less than Apple.

Timely (repaired in 20 mins!), efficient, and has a 'If it isn't perfect, bring it back and let me try again" policy.

Thank you so much!

name: Christian Cooper
text: Took him an hour. Super friendly!

name: Evelyn Dalia
text: I called ahead of time, explained the issue, guy fixed it in 30 minutes. Awesome customer service and reasonable prices. 👍🏻

name: Fabienne Nirenberg
text:
Phone clinic Auburn
Technician is really very friendly and very professional.
He fixed my IPhone 11 only 20 minutes
He did great job.
Thank you so much.

name: Magic
text: Late last night my cat knocked my iPhone off a counter and shattered it. I went to this Phone Clinic the next afternoon and the man was very nice. Had it fixed within 30 minutes! I just went to Little Italy and grabbed some pizza, by the time I came back to wait for my phone it was already fixed! Looks great and he even put on a screen protector for free. Very nice, fast service. It cost $108 for me, not too bad. I’ve paid more for less quality work and he had an option for a lower quality screen (just the outer part, not the screen itself) for about $10-15 less, but I went with the premium. Great service! (It was an iPhone 7, other ones might cost something different).

name: Clayton Bennett
text: He did a fantastic job, fixed my phone in under 20 minutes while I watched. No gimmicks. Dude was super nice. 10/10 would recommend if you are willing to pay $86 for a cracked phone. He threw in a free tempered glass protector as well 🐐.

name: Emma tuscaloosa
text: My Samsung Note 10 plus was cracked in both sides. I compared prices and quality of screens with few different shops. Phone Clinic had 20$ lower than the others and they claim its OEM. So far so good, works like factory. Will post if anything changes...

name: Kyra Elsasser
text: Great experience here! Super fast, knowledgable, and friendly. My phone’s vibration sounded funny and he tightened up the screws and fixed it in 5 minutes! Thank you.

name: Alec Albright
text: Had my phone fixed in less than an hour, at a very reasonable price.

name: yunus emre özdemir
text: It is the best dependable phone repairer

name: Tori Herron
text: The glass they use for replacement screens is much flimsier than the stock iPhone glass. Shattered whole screen while in an Otterbox within 4 days when I haven’t ever shattered a screen in over 10 years of owning an iPhone (repair was for a drop that damaged the display, glass was still intact). No warranties or refunds available for cracks on their replacement other than $20 off of them replacing it with the same junk glass.

name: Amesha Hill
text: Customer service was very professional and my service was fast. Price was affordable and negotiable! Thanks for the awesome service I truly recommend this company to others! #5⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: shelby s
text: They offer great prices and have taken my phone in multiple times. They are super punctual, reasonable, and always take great care of my phone. I use this place constantly--I'm so clumsy! I would recommend the Phone Clinic to anyone in Auburn.

name: RC Yl
text: He was fast & more affordable.

name: Alexia Kuenzel
text: Took IPhone XR with no screen and was fixed properly within an hour. Phone screen was previously repaired at IFix and took a week to receive fixed phone. Two days later the screen popped off. For anyone needing a quick repair take your phone here! Best place to get any phone repaired at a great price! Highly recommend everyone to take your phone here to get any problems resolved!

name: Tyler Robins
text: Amazing customer service. I had my iPhone X screen replaced with a refurbished screen, but it had some issues initially. The first replacement had scratches under the glass which I didn’t notice until later. He replaced it for free since it was damaged. The second replacement I got worked for the majority of the time but randomly would get ghost touches, click instead of scrolling, and held down keys. It took me a little over a month to be sure it was a problem with the screen and not iOS glitching. Even though I wasn’t able to replicate the problem, he took my word for it and gave me another replacement! Just an outstanding warranty and customer service. Also, he replaced each screen in less than an hour. Not many places will do same day screen repairs like that at a price lower than Apple’s. Can not recommend enough.

name: jeremy smith
text:
My iphone 11 pro max is back to life.

Thx ya all!

text:
Dropped off a phone to have the battery replaced and was told it would be ready in one to two days. Called the next day and was told the wrong battery was ordered but they had another one coming in two days. Called two days later and was told the phone would be ready in 30min. Went up there and was given a run around with now a week wait time. When I went in after the week was told that the battery was ordered off Ebay and "wasn't coming."

Went to IFix in the mall and got the battery replaced in 30min for less then they were charging here...

text: This guy is awesome! Replaced the screen of my iPhone 6 for $60. Completed in a couple of hours. I recommend him!

name: James Weldon
text: My battery died, had the part on hand and replaced it in under an hour for less than I thought it would cost. Would recommend

name: Phillip Vernon
text: Very nice guy and my iphone cracked glass was fixed within 30 minutes. A+ service

name: Drews
text:
DO NOT TRUST THEM FOR BATTERY REPLACEMENTS ON IPHONES.

About a month ago, I got a battery replacement from them on my iphone, and the new one they put in was running out of battery even more than the old one--about 1% per minute--dying at 24%. So, I ran a battery testing app on it, and the replacement they installed performed WORSE than the original battery that was being replaced (the original was over 2 years old!)

So I brought it back to tell the owner, and he had the nerve to put a second garbage battery in my phone. Luckily, I looked at the battery as he was putting it in, and I saw that this "NEW" battery had the serial number literally covered up, with a black marker. I asked him why it was like that, and he stuttered and basically said nothing.

I got my money back and ordered a do-it-yourself kit from amazon, and what do ya know, the battery works great and performs really well on my testing app. These guys are scam artists and they get away with it because most people would never think to act that way.

Be very careful here, or go somewhere else.

resp.text:
Dear Zachary. Sorry for bad experience. We searched in our database we could not find any records.

Could you pls contact us at 205 887 5151

We will be happy to assist you and provide you with new Oem battery. We have warranty with every item we sell. We can contact our vendor to see what is the problem.

Note that sometimes motherboard drains battery dues to shorted caps or diodes.

We will be glad to do free diagnostic.

Please make sure this is the right location, we are located at

111 east magnolia avenue auburn al

Phone Clinic

text: I dropped my iphone 5c face down on the concrete and shattered the whole screen. This was the first time I have ever cracked a phone, so when I asked around, I heard about the Phone Clinic here at Auburn. I took it in and it only took 30 minutes and my phone looked brand new! Price is up there but not nearly as bad as other places would charge (less than $100 for mine)

name: Kay M.
text: awesome and very quick service!! very impressed with how quick they worked and how great my phone works now!

name: Bristol Clarence
text: Worst phone service ever. I got my phone fixed and was assured I'd have an OEM part. It wasn't. Then it broke when I pressed a button. Not only that, but I came back in to talk to them about their poor work, and they suggested that I unload more money for a new one. STEER CLEAR OF SCAMMERS.

resp.text:
Do you have any proof that it was not OEM?
We use OEM retina displays. Claim with no proof is just guess. Most probably your frame was very bent.  The main problem with iPhone 6 is that frames will bent easily after dropping it for the first time.
We do our best to fix your metal frame as much as we can but keep in mind that we are not body shop.
And if you drop it again it can break easier than before. We always reccomend hard cases for bad frame phones but customers do not listen

name: Jordan Gonder
text: My phone was completely broken and he fixed it within 15 minutes.

name: Ann Marie
text:
BROKE MY PHONE!
I went to get my cracked screen repaired and when my phone was returned the camera didn't work. The phone was in perfect working condition before the screen repair so I went back assuming it was a simple mistake. Turns out not he damaged my motherboard and wouldn't have the correct part to fix it for another week! When I took my phone elsewhere to have the camera fixed they told me the damage he caused was not fixable and I would have to get new phone!

text: fast and excellent service and friendly customer service. Thank you phone clinic auburn!

name: Justin Abalos
text: I came into this store with a broken home button on an iphone 6. He gives it back to me and tells me that there was a screw loose and that the button was off centered. A week later I come back because the home button is not working again. He tells me for the first time at this point there was water corrosion and he dares to charge me AGAIN. why did he not tell me this in the first place? He puts a brand new button on and gives me it back. I get home and try to update my phone through my MacBook and now I get an error 23 message... I google this error message and its an issue with the HOMEBUTTON. I take it BACK to him for a third time and he then tells me I couldn't update my phone with the new button. why does this guy insist on not telling customers important information??? Also, I took it to Ifixit to see if they could fix it and when they took it apart. There were screws and a plate missing in the phone!!!! He was rude, stole my money, and didn't even put parts back in. Trust all these 1 star reviews this store is HORRIBLE!!

Went back and asked if he could replace defective screen and was denied.  What phone repair store doesn't offer any warranty (for their defective screens) and refuses to stand behind their own work?

text:
Horrible service, said could fix in 24 hours, he cracked the new screen, then ordered the incorrect part, and had to order another part which has not shown up.  3 weeks and counting horrible service. getting my phone back and taking to a reputable service.  Be warned.

Thanks

resp.text:
We apologize for this incidence. main problem is that some Android models do not have stable aftermarket parts as iPhones. It is not that we ordered incorrect part, we got defective screen for the first time and then we needed to ship back to our supplier to get another one. We did but got another defective.
This time we bought from another supplier and You came and picked up phone before we get the new part from another supplier.
Here we learned not to buy from a certain supplier, You wrote us negative feedback and we did the same to our supplier. :((

If I could give zero stars I Would.

name: Freznuts
text: Super helpful and professional! I was dubious about taking my PC anywhere for repair, but I'm so glad I did! I was stumped. If I have any other computer problems I'll be taking it back to The Computer Store. 10/10 recommend

name: Khalid AlOgbi
text: Professional and friendly staff, they know what they're doing, upfront no surprises or games.  they  will walk the extra mile just to help you out!

name: Cary Reams
text: Massive thumbs up to these guys!!! I had my second BSOD in two years - Richard, did a full data recovery for me - and reloaded everything - and my machine has NEVER run better!!! I am writing this review several months after Richard fixed my machine - and I promise - it has never run this well! Thank You!!!

name: William Lockheed
text: Ive been in IT for 15 years and needed a very specific replacement SSD for a MacBook, this SSD was used only in the late 2012-2013 Retina model MacBooks and even finding one on Amazon was extremely hard. This store had one IN STOCK for $200, exactly what Amazon charges for a general 1TB SSD. They saved the day and they didn't treat me like I was a moron when I called and asked for the part. The man that helped me was wonderful, stayed a little late on a Friday for me, and 100% saved my day and weekend. Go there to get your stuff fixed!!

name: Brenda Newton
text: I was very impressed with this company. When I spoke to them on the phone they were very polite and very professional and they were extremely good at their job and did not charge us a fortune. Very considerate people!

name: Ronnie Greenlee
text: Paul was extremely helpful thank you Paul five stars

name: Diane Nguyen
text: My laptop screen cracked and I brought it in to Richard based on all his great reviews. He was super friendly and professional. Such a nice man! He had my laptop finished within a couple days! Highly recommend him!!!!! Thank you so much!

name: Gerald Burch
text: The Computer Shop is tops in my book! I take all my computer needs and problems there! Service is great! They never push anything that is not needed!

name: Robert Williams
text: My computer had stopped working, It wouldn't even turn on anymore. I took it to the computer store and gave it to Richard. Few days later, he had it fixed and my computer was working like new. I strongly recommend this place. They are very professional and do good quality work.

name: Landon Owen
text: I went in, and the man inside immediately knew what was wrong with my laptop. While he waited for the part to come in to fix it, he loaned me a spare keyboard to use since mine was broken. When the part finally got in, he had my laptop fixed in an hour. Awesome place. Awesome staff. Awesome dog that roams around the store.

name: David Nowlin
text: 100% trust in the repairs and upgrades that have been preformed. Full explanation of the problem and solution. After my first visit to the Computer Store I knew that I would not need to go anywhere else. Great professional experience

name: Karl Grimm
text: Computer wasn't working this morning.  Very friendly staff got it repaired and back to me by that afternoon.  I will be back with all my computer needs.  FANTASTIC SERVICE!!!

name: Brittany Morris
text:
Can not say enough kind things about this place!!
Went to Apple in New Orleans and was told my MacBook Pro was not able to be fixed so I brought it in to the Computer Store to get a second opinion and it was fixable!

Had another issue a couple years later and Richard was able to fix it with no problem!

He is a definitely the guy to see!!
Great prices & great service.
10/10 recommend.

name: Laurie Craver
text: What a great staff.  They are so knowledgeable, friendly, professional and trustworthy. I have used other repair shops before finding this one and they can either talk down to you or make you feel dumb for not understanding but not here, The Computer Store is the only place to go for your repair to your devices.

name: Joe Lovelace
text: Great to deal with, very good service.

name: Travis Ellisor
text: I took my computer to Mr. Richard after a lightning strike fried my hard drive. He was able to save all of my files, and set everything up on a better hard drive for me. I give him my highest possible recommendation!

name: Chris Ford
text: Extremely knowledge, very responsive with quick turnaround time for getting things fixed. I would highly recommend The Computer Store, they will take great care of you.

name: Marilyn Gullette
text: This is the to go place if you have an Apple computer that needs to be worked on.  They are very knowledgeable,  friendly,  honest,  professional, and trust worthy.  I highly recommend them.  I am very satisfied with the services they provided. Keep up the good work.!!!!!

name: Jaime Mora
text: I came in a hurry needing some ram for my computer. The gentleman who owns the store was very helpful and even put the ram in my computer for free. Very knowledgeable. I recommend it.

name: Sean Grizzle
text: I needed some keyboard work done on my MacBook.  Brought it in, couple of hours later the Computer Store had me ready to go.  Very knowledgeable and made quick work of it.  Nice shop, would highly recommend this place if you need any computer work done.  Reasonable rates as well.

name: Sandria Murphy
text: They are AMAZING!!!! I’m a college student and need my laptop almost all the time ! So when I got a crack into Mac book it took them NO TIME to fix it !!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

name: Arlene Espino
text: Mr. Richard did a great job in getting my computer fixed for me. He explained what need to be done and did it in a timely manner.

name: Sarah Otts
text: The Computer Store was so helpful and efficient when it came to fixing my MAC. His price was the best in town too. I highly recommend!

name: David Smith
text: Have been using these guys for years and I would and do recommend them to anyone for all repairs. Thanks for the great work.

name: Greta Sharp
text: To say I'm pleased is a huge understatement. My laptop needed a new battery and a fan, a problem I thought would take days to solve. In less than three hours, I was good as new, ready to get back to work. The Computer Store is knowledgeable, efficient and customer friendly, as well as reasonably priced. I will definitely be back and I will be recommending The Computer Store to all my friends and colleagues.

name: Daniel Sumrall
text: Great place, friendly guy! Very knowledgeable,  immediately understood what I wanted, and went to work. Super fast ! Fairly priced, and worth every penny . Thanx computer store!

name: Jonathan McConnell
text: Richard is an absolute professional.  Incredibly nice guy and gets the job done.  I highly recommend "The Computer Store."

name: Steve Horlebein
text:
Did a great job at replacing my MacBook screen, upgrading my hard drive, recovering my data and prior customization, and updating the memory chips.  All in one day!  Very impressive and professional.  Oh, did I mention they turned it around in less than 6 hours after they confirmed the special order parts had arrived?  Plus their shop dog is very sweet and gentle.  The upgrades were expensive due to the hardware costs, not their labor charges.
I have over 30 years of professional I/T experience but am now happily retired and no longer have access to a lab with proper tools and other equipment to make the repairs/upgrades/restores myself.  Without hesitation I will return—they are now my default place to go for computer repairs.  I would recommend them to everyone I meet who might need such maintenance or repairs.  Even my favorite relatives!  Thanks!

name: Michaela Rader
text: The man that works here is so friendly and time efficient. His prices are straight-forward and he doesn’t try to sell you things you don’t need. I can’t recommend this place enough!!

name: Kearus Lang
text: The man that works here is EXCELLENT !! Brought computer in to be fixed at 10 and he was finished at 10:15 I will always come back here love the customer service

name: Adam Hamilton
text: Excellent, fast service. Come here for your Apple product needs. Courteous, knowledgeable, and good communication.  Conveniently located in West Mobile.

name: TCB STUDIOS
text: So I am a music producer and make a living on my computer. so it was very important that I get up and running asap. My Mac was running super slow once I upgraded to Mojave. I didn't know what to do. but then I came to the computer store and mr. Richard with his excellent customer service assured me that everything was going to be alright and sure enough within one day everything was back running better that normal. Great guy good knowledge would recommend anybody with computer problem to him.

name: John Cauley
text: Very helpful. Know they're stuff

name: Fred A
text: He’s a great guy and has always taken care of any apple product I’ve sent his way. He has great communication. Don’t hesitate to take any of your machines, phones etc to him.

name: SamBurger with cheese
text: Wonderful service. I was in and out within 30 minutes. I had my iPhone 6 battery replaced. The price was great especially since it was the only iPhone battery repair servicer open at 8 am. I highly recommend.

name: Ronnie Fulton
text: They seem to care about what problems your  computer  is having

name: Bobvilla 251
text: Wouldn't even look at what I had. Simply said we don't do that.

name: dreams chaser
text: Do not believe the owner when he says you have a 6month warranty. Be sure to get this in writing. My computer stopped working a week after it was fixed and they owner wanted to charge me an additional $500.

name: Richard Jumper
text: I needed a replacement LCD for my older Dell laptop that my 1 year old destroyed when he decided to "help daddy work". This store had exactly what I needed on the shelf for a fair price. I was up and running in no time. Thanks again!

name: MooreWorship
text: Richard was my tech guy. He was very knowlegable and very helpful. I express the trouble I was having and He was able to diagnose my computer issue in minuets. The computer was fixed within a five hour time period. Amazing Timely Service!

name: Marcus Agnew
text: Great place fast, honest and very knowledgeable!!

name: Shauna Meiri
text: Fixed my old MacBook Pro in a timely and efficient manner. Super friendly and helpful, they took the time to explain all the issues and I am so happy to have found them as we have just relocated to the area.

name: Stephen Guy
text: Great place. Very knowledgeable.

name: Beau Albanese
text: Don't listen to all the other complainers out there.  I have been a customer there for a couple of years and always get excellent service.  If they don't have the part in stock that you need, they will usually get it the next day.  They are always professional and courteous.  I would recommend this store to anyone with a PC or Mac, but especially a mac.  They know what they are doing!!  Thanks for the awesome service guys!!!

name: Dasheva Blackheart
text: While they didnt have what we needed they opened 10 minutes early and sent us in the right direction. Love these guys.

name: Nick Kline
text: I thought it was hopeless for my computer, I gave up on it and had already bought a replacement. Then I was recommended this store from a Geek Squad employee. Got the diagnostic he said quote "Your battery is swollen, it's like an acid bomb ready to burst" 3 days later and it was back good as new with updated OS as well, these people are seriously experts and they will do cosmetics for free, I don't even remember his name, but I had 1 broken key on my keyboard and he replaced all of the to slick new keys. Super satisfactory and a decent price too.

name: Dottie Lord
text: These guys know their stuff!!! When my laptop decided on the "blue screen of death" as its final operation, they knew just what to do to get me up and running again. Very knowledgeable, courteous, and HONEST.  Grant even gave a bit of advice on another device that was malfunctioning, so that I wouldn't be out of pocket for a small issue, easily remedied at home. I would DEFINITELY recommend them to anyone who needs any computer repair. A+++++ service!

name: Taylor Hurst
text: I had my Macbook Air screen replaced by The Computer Store. They were helpful, fast, and fair with pricing!

name: Marie Greenwell
text: I am a college student and had shattered by laptop screen, took it in and they had it done within a few hours at a reasonable price. Great customer service and quick.

name: Timothy Jensen
text: Replaced the hard drive on my iMac using a new drive I bought on sale elsewhere and did the work within a couple of hours. Then, on another visit, Richard spent nearly an hour helping my wife and me diagnose another problem at no charge. I'll be back.

name: William Hillman
text: They were able to figure out what was wrong with my Macbook Pro within 12 business hours, gave me multiple options for repairs, and had it repaired within a weeks time. Great customer service! They were extremely helpful.

name: Laura Greer
text: They have been more than helpful . Always fixing my problem in a very timely manner sometimes right on the spot . would definitely recommend ,

name: A Aydah
text: Not sure why they have negative reviews they are real experts...  Very good customer service.  Very helpful

name: Brad Latta
text: Great communication, and great experience. Fixed my MacBook Pro in one day. Will definitely use again!

name: Aaron Wood
text: These guys were quick and professional when troubleshooting the problem with my system. My MacBook pro had a failed logic board and I was in an out of there in 3 business days with data backed up.

name: Kenisha Woods
text: Everybody

name: Chad Terry
text: I gotta give mad props to these guys.  My MacBook had a display issue.  With only a few days left on my Apple warranty, they fixed my display, and I could not be happier.  They also had MagSafe boards in stock that I got when a power surge cooked our power adapters.

name: John Hammond
text:
Would totally recommend this company. Scott & Michelle are great!!
Super service

name: Samira Crabb
text:
Still waiting on my iPad from Apple to send in to them  for me just to get a new one since I have a warranty on it. They have poor communication skills. Everyday I to call to get results about my iPad when they said they would call themselves , but never did. It has been almost 2 weeks( I'm still waiting now ) if I would've known it was gone take this long, I wouldn't made a trip to Birmingham at the Apple Store and got the new iPad there.

The computer store are unorganized and they seem to always be lying about something and being sneaky. I just got a call yesterday saying my "find my iPad" was on so that stopped the process for me getting my iPad.  I clearly was in front of the employer who cut it off for me , and I saw her do it myself. So when the technician guy said other wise, I knew he was lying. Why does it take this long to look at a freaking iPad.

I do not recommend at all ! Will never go back.

name: Steven Harper
text: The best place for all of your computer repair needs. They have true professionals on staff who know their stuff!

name: Ryan Caffee
text: Computer store that's sold out of ram the day after Christmas, it seems after over five years of business they've still yet to discover how to stock for the holidays. May as well be a phone repair booth at the mall.

name: Abu Anas
text: Convenient location

name: Bill Carp
text: No answer

resp.text:
Not a deserved 1Star:  Hurricane Sally took out our phones and power like so many other homes and businesses.
Furthermore, our answering service is available in most cases and we 'ALWAYS' reply to left messages.
